abstract: Merger and acquisition activity heightens confidence in stocks and an employment report shows private-sector jobs creation in March.
snippet: Merger and acquisition activity heightens confidence in stocks and an employment report shows private-sector jobs creation in March.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose Wednesday, extending the biggest first-quarter rally in 13 years for the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index, as a report showing companies added more workers in March bolstered optimism about the economy.

headline.main: Shares Rise on Job Gains, Extending S.&P. Rally
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise on Job Gains, Extending S.&P. Rally
